metadata.title: CVE-2020-10574 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Janus through 0.9.1. janus.c tries to use a string that doesn't actually exist during a "query_logger" Admin API request, because of a typo in the JSON validation.

criterions.comment: janus package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
